channel.title: How to add models in your client
channel.description:
There is two ways of importing models into your 317 client. 1.)Copy and paste Silab Models into your client (Warning: Could mess up some models or not, im not too sure) [b]Or.....[/b] 2.)This method using RSMV program to steal runescape's models and inport them into your 317 client using other programs to Hack, Rename, Convert the .DAT (btw can you give me the links of these tools that will help me too import the RS models into my 317 client?)
And i am also wondering which way is the best? Cuz i really want the Anchor model, and the last time i got the model from a silab client and imported to my 317 client, my Void Top Model got messed and turned into a toy pig on each hand.
And also the other method, i havent used that method before, so i kinda also need some of your helpful tips and guides suggestions, TuTS what ever (is ok)
_Burnt W_Pwnt_!

1.)Copy and paste Silab Models into your client (Warning: Could mess up some models or not, im not too sure)
